phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
The first semester midterms have ended...
Supposedly that junior Sadako Kuronuma grows them.
There have been stories about her curses since freshmen year!
The theme for this year's school festival is Fantasy!
Any suggestions for what our class should do?
I hope I can participate too.
Whatever's fine, just hurry up and pick.
What about Sadako's Black Magic Cafe?
Sadako's famous among the freshmen too.
We can use those weird herbs she grows and make tea.
We could make an Ask Sadako booth!
But make it more like a fortune-teller's tent!
She is doing well for herself.
Alright, let us take a vote!
Class Exhibit Sadako's Black Magic Cafe: 26 Haunted House: 7 Costume Parade Midnight Monster Parade
Oh right, there is a Vap Ca tea, is not there?
I thought it might be helpful to have some on hand.
Sadako's growing a bunch of medicinal herbs!
Hey, do you think we could use perilla in the cafe?
We could make tea with it.
As long as you steep it in hot water, you can make tea with just about anything.
I wanted to talk to him, but I did not know what to say.
but it feels like we have drifted even further apart now.
Am I the one who is drifting away from him?
Sawako is trying to talk to him but Kazehaya's just been so difficult lately...
You are probably the most different from her.
I am screwed if I do not fix this.
going with you this Sunday, right?
Yeah, we are going together in his dad's car.
Take your gel eyeliner and draw a line right on your lash line.
Make the portion right above your irises the thickest.
Extend the line past the outer corner of your eye
I had a doll like this once.
No matter what style you are trying to do, foundation is crucial.
Thank you for coming over so early in the morning.
I got a good laugh out of it too.
You know, it is not all about making your eyes look big or whatever
The almond shape of your eyes is what makes them beautiful.
You have to leverage that to show off your beauty.
Today's an important day for you too.
And afterwards, let us highlight your eyes in a pale pink to soften the look.
Hurry up and get in the car!
You and I will be even closer now.
That was a beautiful wedding, was not it?
Oh yeah, it is almost time for your summer tournament, right?
Yeah, it is right after the school festival.
You guys better win this time!
What did you want to talk about?
There is something, is not there?
I said I do not want to.
You just have to tell him what he wants to hear!
You can say that he totally understands Sawako, 100!
No, I do not think that works.
I do not want to say it.
I will ask him what is wrong though.
It is'because I am worried about him too.
And that does not mean I am going to tell you anything if he tells me.
Shota, you are not going to the cafeteria?
I am going to drop off this toolbox first then head over.
I am so excited for the Black Magic Cafe!
There is the Ask Sawako fortune-telling booth too.
I-I do not actually have any supernatural powers
Will I really be able to help people with their problems?
Just tell them what you see.
Yeah, you are really good at that!
I could make tea with a blend of perilla and Thunberg's geranium
I want to have a talk with you.
I am not letting you sleep tonight either!
I will keep what Chizuru said in mind.
So in the end, did you decide to confront her or not?
I was just wondering what is wrong.
I do not know how I should treat her anymore.
I have always acted however I liked around her.
I cannot say I did that for her sake.
Some of the things I did probably bothered her.
And when I think of that, I just do not know what to do anymore.
Then I think I could just ask her
Do you think she would actually say something is bothering her?
Sitting all the way over here, calmly eating his lunch.
Is there something wrong with that?
Your lover's cheating on you at the moment!
That is not cheating and we are not together.
Then you have not even confessed to her yet, is that it?
You should just tell her how you feel!
Sing out your love to her under the majestic sun.
Work up your small, insect-like courage and confess your love from the top of the jungle gym!
Why does this guy know so much?!
What, you are already done, Ryu?
Especially when Kuronuma probably knows nothing at all.
It is possible that she does know but just finds it annoying.
I really do not understand her.
Who do you think you are?
Where did you say they were?
She is by that weird garden
It seems like you are fitting in really well.
Seeing her life flash before her eyes
I-Is this what fitting in is like?
I have only ever seen it in my dreams!
You are no longer an outcast.
See, even without Kazehaya's help, you are totally fine!
Or did you always want to be an outcast so that Kazehaya would help you?
It is always been my goal...
It is something I have always longed for.
Because he is always treated me so normally,
He only cares about you because you look so depressed all the time!
He just cared about me because I seemed depressed.
I am happy but I am also shocked.
I always looked up to that part of Kazehaya.
It is an easy mistake to make.
With Kazehaya always paying special attention to you and all.
I am sure Kazehaya did not mean to do any harm.
He is just kind of insensitive I guess.
Kazehaya's always fair and kind and friendly, no matter who he is dealing with!
He is always greeted even me with a smile!
When I told him how I felt, he believed me.
He is the first person I could talk to without feeling like there was a wall between us.
It is because he is always like that that I fell in love with him.
And yet, that was not enough anymore.
I could not believe how greedy I was becoming.
It is hard to admit stuff like this, even to myself.
Do not you think it would be a good idea to avoid Kazehaya from now on?
You should live your own life, enjoy your youth!
And Kazehaya's mission would be completed so he could
Sadako, Kazehaya has someone he likes.
I did not want to tell you,
but now do not you think you can leave him alone?
You do not want to be a bother to him, right?
You were that serious about him?!
I am sure there is someone better for you out there though!
Sadako, you are much cuter when you smile!
There was nothing I could do
It is okay, it is okay!
There are tons of guys out there!
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
In the beginning, I thought it was only natural
